title: http.ReadRequest will not parse a responce
body:
by **tm1rbrt**: 
http.ReadRequest fails to parse this response from bitcoin rpc, complaining with:
malformed HTTP version "OK"

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Wed, 06 Jul 2011 21:26:26 +0000
Connection: close
Content-Length: 39
Content-Type: application/json
Server: bitcoin-json-rpc/0.3.23-beta

{"result":114548,"error":null,"id":""}
